T02D1306:215a-1: nee ra a'a tam s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1306:215a-3: bdag med ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1306:215a-4: bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1306:215b-0: 'khor ba bud med gdul @215b gzigs nas //
T02D1306:215b-1: bdag med rnal 'byor mar bsgyur gang //
T02D1306:215b-2: thub pas pha rol phyin phyag 'tshal //
T02D1306:215b-4: rnal 'byor dang po slob dus na //
T02D1306:215b-5: nges pa'i gnas bzang brtag byas te //
T02D1306:215b-6: gar gnas sngas pas sgrub ba yi //
T02D1306:215b-7: sems ni gcig bu mnyam gzhag pa'i //
T02D1306:215b-8: ri dang tshad tshing bya skyibs ni //
T02D1306:215b-9: me tog 'bras bu sogs brgyan pa'i //
T02D1306:215b-10: rdo rje skyil krung bcas byas la //
T02D1306:215b-11: snying gar pam las padma ste //
T02D1306:215b-12: de steng ram las nyi dkyil 'khor //
T02D1306:215b-13: der ni gsal bar aa bsams te //
T02D1306:215b-15: rdo rje las byung thugs rje che //
T02D1306:215b-16: nam mkhar rje btsun dmigs byas la //
T02D1306:215b-17: rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi //
T02D1306:215b-18: lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bya //
T02D1306:215b-19: goo r'i ri bong can 'dzin cing //
T02D1306:215b-20: chom rkun ma ni nyi ma'i snod //
T02D1306:215b-21: ro langs ma ni lag na chu //
T02D1306:215b-22: za phod ma ni sman 'dzin cing //
T02D1306:215b-23: pukka s'i lag rdo rje ste //
T02D1306:215b-24: de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin //
T02D1306:215b-25: gtum mo cang te'u brdung byas te //
T02D1306:215b-26: 'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod //
T02D1306:215b-27: 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas //
T02D1306:215b-28: g-yung mos phrag nas 'khyud pa nyid //
T02D1306:215b-29: bla mas sangs rgyas rab tu mchod //
T02D1306:215b-30: bla ma rdo rje mchod nas ni //
T02D1306:215b-31: bdun po yongs su dag pa bya //
T02D1306:215b-32: sdig pa byas pa bshags pa dang //
T02D1306:215b-33: byed pa yang ni sdom pa dang //
T02D1306:215b-34: bsod nams dag la rjes yi rang //
T02D1306:215b-35: de nas yongs su bsngo bar gyis //
T02D1306:215b-36: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro //
T02D1306:215b-37: byang chub mchog sems bskyed pa dang //
T02D1306:215b-38: lam la gnas shing bdag kyang ni //
T02D1306:215b-39: gzhan gyi don du 'bul ba dang //
T02D1306:215b-40: gnang nod yang ni tshangs pa yi //
T02D1306:215b-41: gnas bzhis sems ni dbugs phyung ste //
T02D1306:215b-42: dang po byams pa bsgom par bya //
T02D1306:215b-43: gnyis pa snying rje'i bye brag bsgom //
T02D1306:215b-44: gsum pa dga' ba bsgom par bya //
T02D1306:215b-45: thams cad tha ma btang snyoms so //
T02D1306:215b-46: phyis ni byang chub sems brtan bya //
T02D1306:215b-47: de nas bsrung pa'i dam tshig go //
T02D1306:215b-48: dad po bden brdzun rnam dpyad nas //
T02D1306:215b-49: rtog pa bya na bsgom mi nus //
T02D1306:215b-50: bskyed pa med par rab sbyor bas //
T02D1306:215b-51: bskyed pa 'di ni rab bshad do //
T02D1306:215b-52: aom sh'u nya t'a dznya'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tam ko& ham //
T02D1306:215b-53: stong par rab bskyed h'um sngon las //
T02D1306:215b-54: sna tshogs rdo rje'i bsam gtan bya //
T02D1306:216a-0: @216a * // 'gro ba'i bdud rnams sel byed pa //
T02D1306:216a-1: h'um las gsal bar spro bar bya //
T02D1306:216a-2: aom raksha raksha h'um h'um zhes brjod do //
T02D1306:216a-3: 'di las rdo rjes bskor ba'i gur //
T02D1306:216a-4: bla re yang ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1306:216a-5: nam mkha'i khams su bha ga bsam //
T02D1306:216a-6: de yi dbus su bsgom pa ni //
T02D1306:216a-7: yam byung rlung gi dkyil 'khor te //
T02D1306:216a-8: sngon po gzhu bdungs ba dan mtshan //
T02D1306:216a-9: ram byung me yi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1306:216a-10: rdo rje'i phreng bskor gru gsum dmar //
T02D1306:216a-11: bam las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum //
T02D1306:216a-12: dkar po bum pas bskor ba mtshan //
T02D1306:216a-13: lam byung dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ste //
T02D1306:216a-14: ser po rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor //
T02D1306:216a-15: bhr'um las 'khor lo'i steng du bdag / srid pa bar ma bsam byas nas //
T02D1306:216a-16: ae wam nyid du rab tu 'dres //
T02D1306:216a-17: 'dres gyur de las byung ba ni //
T02D1306:216a-18: sangs rgyas pho brang thun mong yin //
T02D1306:216a-19: ngos bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi dang //
T02D1306:216a-20: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan byas te //
T02D1306:216a-21: dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan //
T02D1306:216a-22: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes //
T02D1306:216a-24: kha sbyor gnyis dang skyon med par //
T02D1306:216a-25: ze 'bru la ni gcig nyid de //
T02D1306:216a-26: gru gsum las ni gzhan du brjod //
T02D1306:216a-27: de yi dbus su ro bsams la //
T02D1306:216a-28: bco lnga'i gdan ni bdag nyid do //
T02D1306:216a-29: de yi steng du zla ba yin //
T02D1306:216a-30: zla ba'i steng du sa bon te //
T02D1306:216a-31: phyis ni nyi mas mnan pas so //
T02D1306:216a-32: gnyis su 'dus pa'i bde chen po //
T02D1306:216a-33: a'a li zla ba'i gzugs su gnas //
T02D1306:216a-34: k'a li nyi ma'i gzugs gnas te //
T02D1306:216a-35: zla ba nyi ma gnyis 'dus las //
T02D1306:216a-36: goo r'i la sogs sa bon ni //
T02D1306:216a-37: aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri r'i li l'i ae aee ao aoo aam /
T02D1306:216a-38: a'a li dang po bdag med ma //
T02D1306:216a-39: a'a li gnyis pa rdo rje ste //
T02D1306:216a-40: a'a li gsum pa goo r'i ste //
T02D1306:216a-41: bzhi pa chu yi rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1306:216a-42: lnga pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1306:216a-43: drug pa pukka s'i zhes brjod //
T02D1306:216a-44: ri khrod ma ni bdun pa ste //
T02D1306:216a-45: gtum mo brgyad par shes par bya //
T02D1306:216a-46: dgu pa dang ni g-yung mo nyid //
T02D1306:216a-47: yang ni goo r'i lnga gnyis pa //
T02D1306:216a-48: chom rkun ma ni bcu gcig ste //
T02D1306:216a-49: bcu gnyis ro langs ma zhes bya //
T02D1306:216a-50: bcu gsum pa ni za phod ma //
T02D1306:216a-51: bcu bzhi sa spyod ma zhes bya //
T02D1306:216a-52: bco lnga pa ni mkha' spyod ma //
T02D1306:216a-53: rnal 'byor ma rnams sa bon no //
T02D1306:216a-54: zla ba me long ye shes ldan //
T02D1306:216a-55: mnyam nyid ldan pa rta bdun pa //
T02D1306:216b-0: rang lha'i sa bon phyag @216b mtshan ni //
T02D1306:216b-1: so sor rtog pa yin zhes brjod //
T02D1306:216b-2: thams cad gcig gyur nan tan te //
T02D1306:216b-3: rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste //
T02D1306:216b-4: 'di dag thams cad rdzogs pa ni //
T02D1306:216b-5: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin te //
T02D1306:216b-6: zla ba nyi ma rab phye bas //
T02D1306:216b-7: a'a li shes rab k'a li thabs //
T02D1306:216b-8: goo r'i la sogs 'di las byung //
T02D1306:216b-9: dang po nang gi kha sbyar ba //
T02D1306:216b-10: nges par rnal 'byor ma lnga gnas //
T02D1306:216b-11: dbang po rdo rje gshin goo r'i //
T02D1306:216b-12: chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1306:216b-13: lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1306:216b-14: dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1306:216b-15: phyi rol gyi ni kha sbyor la //
T02D1306:216b-16: dbang ldan du ni pukka s'i //
T02D1306:216b-17: byin za'i grvar ni ri khrod ma //
T02D1306:216b-18: bden bral du ni gtum mo ste //
T02D1306:216b-19: rlung gi mtshams su g-yung mo nyid //
T02D1306:216b-21: shar gyi phyogs su goo r'i ste //
T02D1306:216b-22: lho dang nub dang byang du ni //
T02D1306:216b-23: chom rkun ro langs za phod ma'o //
T02D1306:216b-25: steng zhal ma dang 'og zhal ma //
T02D1306:216b-26: lha mo sa spyod mkha' spyod ma'o //
T02D1306:216b-27: kha dog nag mo drag chen mo //
T02D1306:216b-28: 'khor lo bdag po bdag med ma //
T02D1306:216b-29: zhal gcig ma la spyan gsum dmar //
T02D1306:216b-30: phyag gnyis skra ser gyen du 'greng //
T02D1306:216b-31: g-yon pa thod pa kha tv'am ga / g-yas pa'i phyag gis gri gug 'dzin //
T02D1306:216b-32: 'khor lo rna cha mgur chu dang //
T02D1306:216b-33: lag gdub dang ni ska rags 'dzin //
T02D1306:216b-34: skyil krung phyed pas ro mnan nas //
T02D1306:216b-35: stag gi pags pas smad dkris shing //
T02D1306:216b-36: bdag med rnal 'byor ji bzhin du //
T02D1306:216b-37: 'di dag thams cad mtshungs par bshad //
T02D1306:216b-38: rang snying pad snying sa bon bsam //
T02D1306:216b-39: ye shes snying gar ye shes bsgom //
T02D1306:216b-40: dgug par byas te yang dag mchod //
T02D1306:216b-41: ye shes 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
T02D1306:216b-42: mig la sogs par gti mug sogs //
T02D1306:216b-43: rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod //
T02D1306:216b-44: gti mug rdo rje mig gnyis la //
T02D1306:216b-45: rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma //
T02D1306:216b-46: sna la ser sna ma zhes brjod //
T02D1306:216b-47: kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
T02D1306:216b-48: reg la phrag dog rdo rje ma //
T02D1306:216b-49: yid la rnal 'byor bdag med ma //
T02D1306:216b-50: sku gsung de bzhin thugs kyi ni //
T02D1306:216b-51: aom dang a'a: h'um sngags 'di las //
T02D1306:216b-52: mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod ma //
T02D1306:216b-53: sa 'og gnas pa'i bsam gtan bya //
T02D1306:216b-54: sna tshogs gzugs su yang dag brjod //
T02D1306:217a-2: snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer ni //
T02D1306:217a-3: lcags kyu'i rnam pas bde gshegs bkug / lha mo brgyad kyis mchod byas na //
T02D1306:217a-4: dbang bskur ba ni blang ba'o //
T02D1306:217a-5: bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
T02D1306:217a-6: bdag la dbang bskur la sogs gsol //
T02D1306:217a-7: de nas he ru ka yi gzugs //
T02D1306:217a-8: de nas bdag la dbang bskur bsam //
T02D1306:217a-9: sems dang rtag pa rin chen bdag / snang ba mtha' yas don grub rnams //
T02D1306:217a-10: bdag med shar gyi rdo rje sogs //
T02D1306:217a-11: rnal 'byor ma lngas rgya yis gdab //
T02D1306:217a-12: sems dang rtag pa rin chen bdag / snang mtha' mtshams kyi rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1306:217a-13: zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal che //
T02D1306:217a-14: 'dod chags rdo rje phyogs gnas ma //
T02D1306:217a-15: rgyas gdab sku dang gsung nyid kyis //
T02D1306:217a-16: mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod ma //
T02D1306:217a-17: dang po nag po bsgom par bya //
T02D1306:217a-18: gnyis pa dmar po bsgom pa ste //
T02D1306:217a-19: gsum pa ser po bsgom pa'o //
T02D1306:217a-20: de bzhin bzhi pa ljang gu'o //
T02D1306:217a-21: lnga pa kha dog sngon po'o //
T02D1306:217a-22: drug pa dkar por rnam par bsgom //
T02D1306:217a-23: rnal 'byor yan lag drug bsgom bya //
T02D1306:217a-24: lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis //
T02D1306:217a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te //
T02D1306:217a-26: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs pas //
T02D1306:217a-27: bsreg pas ham las ri bong 'dzag / bsam gtan gyis du ba rnal 'byor gang //
T02D1306:217a-28: de ni dag pa rjes dran bya //
T02D1306:217a-29: gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te //
T02D1306:217a-30: tshor ba gsang ba goo r'i ste //
T02D1306:217a-31: de bzhin chu lha 'du shes ma //
T02D1306:217a-33: rnam shes phung po gzugs su ni //
T02D1306:217a-34: bdag med rdo rje ma gnas so //
T02D1306:217a-35: sa khams pukka s'i ru brjod //
T02D1306:217a-36: chu khams ri khrod ma ru brjod //
T02D1306:217a-37: drod ni gtum mo rab tu brjod //
T02D1306:217a-38: rlung ni g-yung mor rab tu grags //
T02D1306:217a-39: gzugs la goo r'i rab tu grags //
T02D1306:217a-40: sgra la chom rkun rab tu grags //
T02D1306:217a-41: dri yi cha la ro langs ma //
T02D1306:217a-42: ro la de bzhin za phod ma //
T02D1306:217a-43: reg bya la ni sa spyod de //
T02D1306:217a-44: chos kyi khams la mkha' spyod ma //
T02D1306:217a-45: zhe sdang rdo rje mar bshad do //
T02D1306:217a-47: phrag dog rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste //
T02D1306:217a-48: ser sna gsang ba'i goo r'i ma //
T02D1306:217a-49: de bzhin gti mug rdo rje ste //
T02D1306:217a-50: yid la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1306:217a-51: zhe sdang la sogs dag pa'o //
T02D1306:217a-52: skyes pa'i bdud ni mgo bo 'dzin //
T02D1306:217b-0: gri gug @217b lha ni gcod pa'o //
T02D1306:217b-1: thod pa nyon mongs mgo bo yi //
T02D1306:217b-2: phung po'i bdud ni ro brjod do //
T02D1306:217b-3: mi bskyod pa ni 'khor lo'i gzugs //
T02D1306:217b-4: snang ba mtha' yas rna cha'i bdag / mgur chu
T02D1306:217b-5: la ni rin chen bdag / lag gdub la ni
T02D1306:217b-6: rtag par brjod // ska rags la ni don yod gnas //
T02D1306:217b-7: phyag rgya lnga ni rnam par dag / bsam gtan gyis dub gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D1306:217b-8: a'a li mtha' yi aa spangs pa //
T02D1306:217b-9: aom yig h'um phat dang ldan pa'i //
T02D1306:217b-10: sv'a h'a mthar gzhag gsang sngags so //
T02D1306:217b-11: aom aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri r'i li
T02D1306:217b-12: l'i ae aee ao aoo aam h'um phat sv'a h'a
T02D1306:217b-13: / 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa dang //
T02D1306:217b-14: bgegs ni zad cing zhi ba'i phyir //
T02D1306:217b-15: 'og nas bshad pa'i cho ga yis //
T02D1306:217b-16: mi g-yo bas ni gtor ma sbyin //
T02D1306:217b-17: rlung me thod pa la gnas pa //
T02D1306:217b-18: 'bar bas bsro ba la sogs pas //
T02D1306:217b-19: sha chen bdud rtsi lnga bsgrub po //
T02D1306:217b-20: yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs pa'i //
T02D1306:217b-52: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02D1306:217b-53: a'a dya nu tpann tv'a ta /
T02D1306:217b-54: aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1306:217b-55: mkhas pa chen po dpal mi thub zla bas mdzad pa'i bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D1306:217b-57: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya dha ra dang /
